sections.title: Slurm APIs
sections.content:
OverviewAll of the Slurm commands utilize a collection of Application Programming
Interfaces (APIs) exposed through the "slurm.h" and "slurmdb.h" headers.
Slurm's APIs are fixed within each major release. They do change —
significantly — between each major release.Developers are encouraged to target Slurm's REST API
 which provides for broader cross-version compatibility.
Last modified 12 February 2024
